Special thanks to Mrs. DeBoer for helping make this happen for our students!!

div.p: Welcome to West Michigan Academy of Arts and Academics! We are so pleased that you are interested in our amazing school. We combine all of our core academics with an arts focus allowing our students to experience learning from a more complete perspective. Please read more to find out about how we could be the perfect fit for your child!

div.span: At West Michigan Academy of Arts and Academics we use arts integration everyday! Arts integration is an approach to teaching in which students construct and demonstrate understanding through an art form. Students engage in a creative process, which connects an art form and another subject area and meets evolving objectives in both.

At West Michigan Academy of Arts and Academics we love our families! We encourage family involvement in the day to day operation of the school as well as the performance days. When you come to WMAAA you become part of our school family and this place will always be a part of you!

At West Michigan Academy of Arts and Academics, we agree with the large body of research that suggests that students learn best in smaller classrooms where the relationships between teachers and students can flourish!
At West Michigan Academy of Arts and Academics, we are a tuition-free public charter school that is supported by Grand Valley State University! Please come and join our team!
